definition: abbr. for various central banks, notably 中國人民銀行|中国人民银行[Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Yin2 hang2] and 中央銀行|中央银行[Zhong1 yang1 Yin2 hang2]

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

sentences.english: The central bank issued a commemorative 10-yuan bank note to mark the Beijing Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 央行为纪念北京奥运会将发行10圆面值的纪念钞。

sentences.english: Pilot to float interest rates starts at CMB .
sentences.chinese: 央行将在招行实行试点，实施市场浮动利率。

sentences.english: Monitor CBC and for mucositis weekly.
The earthquake-hit regions will be exempt from the hike, the central bank said.
sentences.chinese: 央行还表示地震重灾区法人金融机构暂不涨价。

sentences.english: European Inter-bank lending rates fell after the ECB's press conference.
sentences.chinese: 央行新闻发布会召开之后欧洲银行间拆借利率下跌。

sentences.english: Bank of Canada head Stephen Poloz is testify before the finance committee in Ottawa.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大央行行长波洛兹将在渥太华金融委员会作证词。

sentences.english: The sizes of the 28-day loans will shrink early next year.
sentences.chinese: 央行将在明年年初缩小28天贷款的规模。

sentences.english: Few expect the ECB to cut interest rates soon.
sentences.chinese: 极少有人预期欧洲央行将很快降低利率。

sentences.english: Central banks can, of course, print more money, but that would stoke inflation.
sentences.chinese: 当然，央行可以加印钞票，但这会加剧通胀。

sentences.english: Not any time soon -- the ECB's bailout package makes sure of that.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲央行的财政援助可以保证近期内是不会的。

sentences.english: Bank of England raises interest rates as economy sizzles.
sentences.chinese: 经济形式良好，英国央行调高利率。

sentences.english: If credit growth roars on, the Chinese central bank will have a lot of trouble controlling inflation.
sentences.chinese: 如果信贷持续增加，央行控制通货膨胀将步履维艰。

sentences.english: Some central bankers will shudder at the thought.
sentences.chinese: 一些央行将对该想法感到惊恐。

sentences.english: At the same time, the central bank reduced refinancing and rediscount rate, and so on.
sentences.chinese: 同时，央行降低再融资和再贴现利率，等等。

sentences.english: Through last winter, China’s central bank repeatedly raised the amount of capital it required Chinese commercial banks to deposit with it.
sentences.chinese: 去年整个冬天，中国央行不断向商业银行缩紧银根。

sentences.english: RARELY has a central bank been lambasted so loudly by so many.
sentences.chinese: 很少有一家央行宛如过街老鼠人人喊打。

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Yin2 hang2

definition: Central Bank of the Republic of China (Taiwan)

pinyin: cun2 kuan3 zhun3 bei4 jin1 lu:4

definition: China Banking Regulatory Commission (CBRC), abbr. for 中國銀行業監督管理委員會|中国银行业监督管理委员会[Zhong1 guo2 Yin2 hang2 ye4 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]
US Federal Reserve (Fed), the US central bank
